name: Self Heimlich Maneuver
description: Perform Heimlich on yourself when choking alone
warning: Use when choking and alone. Act quickly - you may lose consciousness.
emergency_notes: Try coughing first if you can
Use a hard surface if fist method doesn't work

steps.title: If You Are Alone
steps.description: Do not drink water while choking because it can make the situation worse. If you can call, call for an emergency
steps.voice_prompt: Do NOT drink water. If you can, call nine one one for emergency.
steps.critical_warning: ⚠️ Water can push the object deeper - do not drink

steps.title: If You Can't Cough
steps.description: Other alternatives are table, Kitchen Countertop, and other hard surfaces that are in the same height as your belly.
steps.voice_prompt: Find a hard surface at belly height. Use a table, kitchen countertop, or chair back.
steps.critical_warning: Tip: The surface should be solid and at the same height as your navel

steps.title: Slam Your Belly
steps.description: Make sure to slam as hard as you can take
steps.voice_prompt: Lean over the hard surface. Thrust your belly against it forcefully and repeatedly until the object is expelled.
steps.critical_warning: Use maximum force - your life depends on it. Continue until the object comes out or help arrives
